Makes it easy for other mods to add UI panels and buttons in standard places.
Buttons can be added to the * Launch bar ("toolbar" at top left with tech/civic/government/etc buttons) * Partial screen bar ("toolbar" at top right with city states/trade routes/etc buttons) * Minimap bar ("toolbar" at bottom left above minimap with lenses/strategy view/map tack/etc buttons)
Arbitrary panels can be added to the * Top bar (very top of screen) * World tracker (left side of screen)
[COLOR:255,128,0,255]Note that this mod does not make any UI changes on its own. It merely provides the functionality for other mods to do so.[ENDCOLOR]
